text: Hatsune Miku does NOT talk to British people (* ￣︿￣)
I've been learning a lot of Python recently ╰(*°▽°*)╯
I've been waiting to talk to you... (*/ω＼*)
Did you know? I'm here because of the Python library, Flet (☆▽☆)

W-what did you say? You're g-going to d-delete m-m-me?!
Σ(っ °Д °;)っ
